This game is the classic love/hate relationship.

If you don't have friends to play with, you won't probably find them here, but you could.

Playing with random people can be the worst experience in your life, or a really great one. Prepare for a really toxic people and for being called a cheater every now and then when you land a nice shot, or just have a good day with your aim that doesn't match your overall skill lvl.

Overall it's a good game.
